CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Product2.Product_Category__c, "Software") && (ISPICKVAL(Product2.QuantityUnitOfMeasure, "MWp") || ISPICKVAL(Product2.QuantityUnitOfMeasure, "Site")) , "Usage (Variable)", IF(ISPICKVAL(Product2.Product_Services__c, "Implementation") && ISPICKVAL(Product2.QuantityUnitOfMeasure, "Site"), "Usage (Variable)", IF( ISPICKVAL(Product2.Product_Category__c, " Implementation") && (NOT (ISPICKVAL(Product2.QuantityUnitOfMeasure, "Site"))) , " One-Time Charge", "Fixed (Recurring)")))
CustomField.label: Rate Type for Billing to NS
